One of more decades later, some of these individuals develop neuropsychiatric symptoms characteristic of adult-onset citrullinemia type II.   The Human Phenotype Ontology provides the following list of signs and symptoms for Neonatal intrahepatic cholestasis caused by citrin deficiency.
